author: Kate Dominguez
comment: A great way to keep all my passwords organized for work and home.  I love that I can set up folders for the different categories of my life,  and everything is in one convenient app. I pay for the full backup so even if my phone is lost or destroyed, I'll still be able to access all my passwords.

author: dawn asmar
comment: Pros app does exactly as promised.  Cons. Continual pop ups to share with friends, ads for additional apps, prompts to upgrade from pro to business version.    I pay the annual fee, stop badgering your customers

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: We care about creating the best experience for our customers, please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we will help you turn off the popups.

author: allan thach
comment: WARNING!!!! DO NOT SUBSCRIBE TO THEIR SUBSCRIPTION.  I had subscribe and cancelled when it was expired now i cant use the app, since you're required to subscribe again to use the app. Here's their response to my email. "Once your account is cancelled, you can no longer edit or add password. In order for that, you will have to renew your subscription."

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Your satisfaction is our highest concern, please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you.

author: Bobby Booshay
comment: I've been using this App for a while now and I can honestly say it has made life so much easier and it's a easy system to operate and never had a problem with it!!!
title: Great App!!!

author: steven dudley
comment: With the amount of accounts and passwords to remember this app is awesome. Customer service is prompt and very helpful.

author: William Consoliver
comment: Perfect protection for all your passwords. Even after you change devices. Everything is downloaded to your new device. Have been using this app for 5 years.
x40 times more expensive than lastpass...shame

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: We appreciate your feedback and will share it with our product team for further review.

author: April Jeffers
comment: Worth every penny. I've been a subscriber for years and plan on staying that way

author: Terry Ashley
comment: Use it daily!  Best app for keeping passwords.

author: miguel matos
comment: Awesome app

author: James Pakai
comment: Love it.

author: Kathryn Collins Edlund
comment: Have had Keeper for awhile now and at first it was great! Now, all it does is pop-up & tell me  "Keeper has stopped." So, now, I can't log in to anywhere and when I tried to read how to fix it it said,"If you're having trouble then upgrade to a paid subscription" and all will be fine again! Now, I have to go and reset ALL of my passwords to everywhere! Really, really upset about having to reset!

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Kathryn, please send me an email to support@keepersecurity.com and I'll help you with the crash issue. -TingTing

comment: I am absolutely furious with this app! Even though I had backups disabled, this app went ahead and backed up my paraphrases to the cloud. This is a serious violation of my extremely strict threat model. I now have to spend hours changing all of my paraphrases! They literally put my digital safety at risk! As someone who takes Cybersecurity very seriously, this is unacceptable. I will never even consider using this app again.

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Hi, please email me at support@keepersecurity.com and I'd like to review your case. -TingTing

author: Simon Cracknell
comment: I don't need the back up sync but did give it s go. Doesnt seem to be an  option go stay on the basis  package. Trying to strong arm me in to paying simply won't work and completely rules out using the product if I do find I need their extra services

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: After the free trial, you can continue using the free version without any paid features such as sync and backup. Please contact support@keepersecuriyt.com if you have any questions.

author: Jared Miles
comment: Update: Had to drop this by a star due to it using a bad font. The 'O' (as in capital 'o') looks like a 0 (zero). O's should be fat and 0's slim. But that is not the case in Keeper. The O looks like the slimmer 0. I nearly locked myself out of an account where I had used Keeper's random password generator, which had selected an O as one of the characters. Finally realized the problem after copying and pasting the password into Gmail to get a better look at it. This app should allow you to change fonts..........    Love this app. Fingerprint scanning is flawless. Recognizes input fields in all apps I use.

author: Hannah Heidt
comment: YOU WILL GET LOCKED OUT OF ALL YOUR PASSWORDS UNLESS YOU PAY. And it's $30 to upgrade. Sorry, but other apps don't cost nearly as much as this to deliver the same thing.

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: After the free trial, you can use the free version on the same device without sync, back, restore or web access. For further assistance, please contact support@keepersecurity.com.

author: Lorna Russell
comment: Not happy with Renewal Email in 2017, I ended up double paying exchanged emails with Customer Service, did not receive a refund and have received email for 2018 renewal payment. NO contact phone number to call a real person! I have written down my passwords, I think it is time to move on to a more Customer Focused App!!!

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you. You can find our phone number on our website Keepersecurity.com.

author: Lukasz Nowak
comment: Ok so great at first glance. Even let me to import passwords from Google - awesome! Have run security challenge and obviously this needs improvement. So the idea was to use last pass to log in to my all current accounts and change the password to newly generated ones by last pass - MASSIVE FAIL. LP doesn't comprehend option of user wanting to change their password (?!?!) repeatedly fails even in its own browser when it can't recognise password fields. Come on! :-/

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: We appreciate your feedback. You can use our extension to log in to your existing account and then change your password under your account settings. Please contact support@keepersecurity.com if you have any questions.

author: Eric Bonello
comment: Very good app! Secure and convenient saved me alot of troubles! This app is a must have... Saves you the trouble of remembering passwords with the convenience of having actually good passwords, and not one password (to remember) for every account you own! 5star+

author: A Google User
comment: It was a geat app. I've been using it for years, but they keep raising the yearly fee. If you don't renew it bombards you ith notification every time you open the app and in the notification bar and via email. DROP THE RATES TO SOMETHING REASONABLE AND STOP THE HARASSMENT

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Please contact us at support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you.

author: JAMSTER DODGERS
comment: Put in the wrong password once - told me I had ONE more attempt or it was being wiped. I clicked to get a code for verification to change the password, no sooner do I try and enter the code it tells me I've failed and WIPED EVERYTHING!!!

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you.

author: Mark VanWey
comment: I was long time LastPass PAID user and dropped them because of horrible tech support. Keeper will respond to emails within an hour, which is fantastic. It's much more stable, and I only have a few websites that require weird workarounds. The ONLY reason for the 3 stars is because you are forced to use full desktop password on mobile version. I might need to make a new shorter password, but that lowers my security. UPDATE: I took off another 2 stars because they promised thumbprint authentication, but its nowhere in the documentation. Don't promise it and not tell us how to do it. Keeper needs better documentation.

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Hello Mark, we appreciate your feedback. We have one FAQ regarding how to enabled fingerprint login. https://keepersecurity.com/faq.html#q14 If it helps, please update your start, thank you.

author: U. S. Maggu
comment: Keeper has charged my card against my will. They are even threatening me to stop my services in between my current subscription for which I have already paid, if asked for refund against the unwanted renewal. Worst customer service ever.

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you with the billing issues.

author: Geena Martinez
comment: I have been using this app for work and my personal passwords for years. I have a lot of portals for work with different password requirements and I am an executive assistant so I also have to know my bosses login credentials for the same portals. It keeps me organized and the service is reasonably priced. I can't believe I lived without it for most of my adult life. I use it daily.
Love this app, super useful but is there a way to reset the master password? I forgot mine and it said to email you guys but I have yet to hear a response

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: if you forgot your master password, you can enter a wrong password and choose forgot password option to reset your master password. For further assistance, please contact support@keepersecurity.com.

author: joseph crosley
comment: Great app. I did give it 2 stars due to a bug but support contacted me and sorted it out in two emails which is just fantastic! I highly recommend this app.

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Joseph. Please send me an email d2@keepersecurity.com. Darren.

author: allen micheal
comment: Went with this app after using glitchy enpass. So far so good.

author: Tracy Pratt
comment: Love everything about the ap other than the advertisements.  I pay yearly, and still get all the "extras" pushed at me.

author: Graham Torbitt
comment: Good but not perfect, works very well is it me as it seema ro be always looking for ways to take more money off me :-!!

author: Thomas Cook
comment: Works but has trouble with Android apps being able to enter passwords. The Shield sometimes doesn't show up at all

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Thomas, please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you. Could you please try turn off KeeperFill under accessibility and then turn it back on?

author: Paul W
comment: Keeps asking me to save credit card information when I am not doing anything related to credit card information at all (was posting a Reddit comment). Constantly suggests incorrect credentials from entirely unrelated URLs to the site I'm visiting (also happens with the Chrome extension on my PC)

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you.

author: Keisha Buynitzky
comment: The app won't even open for me anymore, at all, no matter what I do. I've needed this in a pinch for very important situations and it's let me down each time.

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you.

comment: It's great, but the auto fill is kind of sketchy on android.. That's the only dark spot..

author: Tom Graham
comment: No use to me if it has to be connected to the internet before I can look up a password. Can't get it to run at all without the internet.

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Tom, you should be able to view your records without internet. Please send me an email to support@keepersecurity.com and I'll take a look. - TingTing

author: Tim Fung
comment: I have changed my mobile and not able to log in.  Very quick response to my email requesting for help. Appreciate the good service support.  Thanks.

author: Matic Cankar
comment: Keeperfill keyboard keeps crashing when I try to make it auto-fill login info to a webpage. So frustrating and useless...

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Matic, sorry to hear. please contact support@keepersecurity.com and provide more details.

author: juston taylor
comment: Fantastic app. I don't like to make all of my passwords the same and I change them regularly. Best app I've found and I've tried lots.

author: Royal Knapper
comment: Horrible app...ended up paying twice and now i cant even get a refund...stay away from this app!!!....Royal K

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Your satisfaction is our highest concern. Please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you with the billing issues.

author: naveen kumar
comment: Good.Does what it says. Quite costly in app purchases .

author: Jeffrey Henzler
comment: you assholes!.... just because i don't renew I CAN'T EDIT THE DAMN INPUTS.....GTH!

reply.author: Keeper Security, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Jeffrey, please contact support@keepersecurity.com and we'll help you.
